title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface that talks to your local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with readline history, syntax highlighting and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion backend for VS Code and Neovim.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers fluent builders, reactive streams and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store; shows ingestion & chat in <100 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model; deploy via Docker in 2 minutes.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API with async/await, streams and native JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with LINQ-style chat builders and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger SDK module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for end-to-end NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama written in Qt6; manage models, chat and monitor GPU usage.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to deploy Ollama on AWS EC2 with NVIDIA GPU, EFS model cache and Tailscale VPN.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Native macOS menu-bar app that starts/stops Ollama service and shows model download progress.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, serde and built-in chat conversation state management.
